org.agreement_technologies.agents

Class PlanningAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agreement_technologies.agents.PlanningAlgorithm

  • public class PlanningAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object
    PlanningAlgorithm class implements the distributed planning protocol.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlanningAlgorithm

        public PlanningAlgorithm(java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.String domainFile,
                 java.lang.String problemFile,
                 AgentList agList,
                 boolean waitSynch,
                 int sameObjects,
                 boolean traceOn,
                 int h,
                 int searchPerformance)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructor of a planning agent.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the agent
        domainFile - Domain filename
        problemFile - Problem filename
        agList - List of agents
        waitSynch - Wait for synchronized start flag
        sameObjects - Same-object filtering flag
        traceOn - Trace enabled flag
        h - Heuristic function
        searchPerformance - Search performance type
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Error during the planning process
        Since:
        1.0
